fields.description:
Upload photo from file with REST API failed.
To reproduce: 
1. Install and run KS> Mashups>Facebook>Photos
2. Click Upload Photo from file with REST API

Actual result:
Alert: Fail

{code}
Jun 28 16:16:40 Europa KitchenSink[543] <Warning>: [DEBUG] Loading: /var/mobile/Applications/86BA439C-BF26-495D-9EE7-2B89DA23A995/KitchenSink.app/ui/common/mashups/facebook_photos.js, Resource: ui/common/mashups/facebook_photos_js
Jun 28 16:16:52 Europa KitchenSink[543] <Warning>: *****!!!!! Error creating directory /var/mobile/Library/Logs/CrashReporter/DiagnosticLogs/Photos/Process: The operation couldnâ€™t be completed. (Cocoa error 513.) !!!!*****
